name: Stellar Strife
description:
Stellar Strife is an upcoming game where you build own spaceships and fight against other players or together against very evil robots. You can also let your co-pilot control the weapons while you pilot the ship.

Features

  • Pilot spaceships that you build from scratch.
  • PvP and PvE.
  • Unlock components and larger ships as you play.
  • Complex movement system with newtonian physics - easy to play but hard to master.
  • Your spaceship will not fly better than you build it, construct it with care!

The game is in pre-alpha and as such many aspects of the game will be improved. The current build lets you test out the Build and PvE modes.

Join our discord community to talk to the developers and join in on multiplayer testing!
